detail.content: NYU School of Professional Studies High School Academy                                                                                          The NYU School of Professional Studies Website    Faculty    Degrees    Professional Certificates    Upcoming Events        Search Courses     Credit Course     Non-Credit Course          Site    Noncredit Courses    Faculty                                                                                                                                               NYU School of Professional Studies High School Academy                                            High School Academy ›                Summer Programs                 Career Edge          Boost          Aspire          International Students          FAQs                   Weekend Workshops                 FAQs                   Critical Instructions for Admitted Students                 Summer Students                   Photo Gallery            Watch Videos                           More Links           Request Information        Contact Us by E-mail                                                                                                              Browse the High School Academy Photo Gallery                                                                     Watch Student Video Testimonials about the Program                                                                Play                                Summer Career Edge Program    During the summer, the NYUSPS High School Academy Career Edge program offers high school students the opportunity to live and learn in the heart of New York City, the cultural and financial capital of the world. These one-week, noncredit professionally oriented intensive programs of study allow you to explore career options and to gain the competitive edge when applying for college. Meet, live, and learn with students from around the world as you build your confidence and your knowledge. Taught by top industry professionals, courses are enhanced by field trips, guest lectures, and hands-on projects.         Learn More            Summer Boost Program    The NYUSPS High School Academy Boost program allows high school students to experience college life and learning during a stimulating three-week session that provides a wealth of career-focused study options. Those who successfully complete this program of study broaden their knowledge in a specific area, while earning college credit. This unique learning experience combines coursework and practical knowledge that can help to explore career opportunities and maybe even decide on a career path. Spend your summer in NYC, as you acquire new skill sets and ready yourself for the road ahead.         Learn More             Summer Aspire Program    NYUSPS High School Academy Aspire is a scholarship program for rising high school juniors (current sophomores) from underrepresented communities who will be first-generation college students. Aspire is a one-week college prep and immersion program, that features a variety of workshops, which prepare students for the college admissions process and the college experience.         Learn More            Weekend Workshops    In addition to excellent grades, the college admissions process requires that high school students demonstrate they are serious about their academic and professional future. The NYU School of Professional Studies High School Academy offers weekend workshops during the fall, winter, and spring that provide high school students with the opportunity to explore their professional options and to enhance their college portfolio. Noncredit Offerings                                                                   Claim Your Digital NYU School of Professional Studies Noncredit Certificate Badge                                                                        Play                              Noncredit Offerings at the NYU School of Professional Studies        The NYU School of Professional Studies is a leader in noncredit continuing education. People from across the country and around the world enroll in our noncredit courses , certificates , online offerings , and intensives . Professionally oriented programs are offered as well as those geared toward personal enrichment. Day, evening, and weekend schedules are available to fit your busy lifestyle. Courses are taught by top industry professionals, who provide you with the latest information in your area of interest.   No matter what your passion or career path, you will find that the School offers a noncredit learning environment like no other. From Creating Websites for Mobile Devices to Collecting and Appraising Rare Books , there is something for everyone.            Noncredit Certificate Digital Badge     Noncredit Academic Policies and Procedures    Noncredit Information Sessions     Dorothy Durkin Torch Circle Benefits    High School Academy     Intensives    Professional Advantage               Ready to Proceed?     Search for a Course Now       Download Summer 2015 Bulletin          Courses     Noncredit courses can provide the information needed to hone your current skills, learn new ones, or simply enrich your life. Choose from thousands of courses that are offered online and onsite. Many can apply towards earning noncredit certificates .         Certificates     More than 100 noncredit certificates are available from which to choose. These programs are comprised of required courses and elective courses that allow you to tailor your program of study to meet your professional goals.           Online Offerings     The NYU School of Professional Studies offers a large number of online noncredit courses. So, you can learn at home, at work, or on the road. Some courses are offered completely online, while others combine online and onsite instruction.                                                                            Advanced Certificate Search                                                       New Courses     New noncredit courses offered by the School put you on the fast track to success by helping you to acquire new skills and to expand upon existing knowledge. A wide selection of new courses are added throughout the semester.           Explore New Courses       Intensives     Intensive programs offer course content in condensed formats. They run throughout the year, but are most prevalent during the summer months. Programs range from 1-12 weeks and provide total immersion in subject matter.           Learn More About Intensives       Register for Courses     To register for a course, call (212) 998-7150; visit sps.nyu.edu ; or visit us in person at 7 East 12th Street, Room 133, Mon.–Thurs., 9 a.m.–7 p.m.; Fri., until 5 p.m; and Sat.–Sun. 9 a.m.–6 p.m.             Create an Account         Login to Your Account to Register                                               QUICK LINKS                        About Us          Student Affairs          Visit Us          School-wide Policies          Contact Us                       ATTEND THE SCHOOL                        Graduate Admissions          Undergraduate Admissions          Noncredit Registration          High School Academy          Professional Advantage                             ON THE WEB                         On Facebook          On Twitter          On YouTube          Browser Requirements                                                        NYU Homepage    © New York University School of Professional Studies | Privacy Policy
